about_system.title: About the System
about_system.description: Overview of the Leave Management System and its purpose.

summary.title: Summary
summary.body: This system streamlines leave requests, approvals, and reporting for all roles.

items.employee: Employees can apply and track leaves.
items.hr: HR manages policies, types, and reports.

apply_leave.title: Apply for Leave
apply_leave.subtitle: Submit your leave request for manager approval
apply_leave.subtitle_loading: Submit your leave request for approval
apply_leave.loading_setup: Setting up your leave application form

placeholders.reason: Please provide a detailed reason for your leave. Include relevant details that will help your manager understand your request. Minimum 10 characters required.
placeholders.handover_notes: Brief notes about work handover, pending tasks, or important contacts...

help.emergency_contact: For urgent contact during your absence
help.handover_notes: Important information for colleagues covering your work

validation.start_date_past: Start date cannot be in the past
validation.end_date_after: End date must be after start date
validation.reason_required: Please provide a reason for leave
validation.reason_min: Reason must be at least 10 characters long
validation.reason_max: Reason must be less than 500 characters
validation.insufficient_balance: Insufficient leave balance. You have {{remaining}} days remaining but requested {{requested}} days.
validation.max_days: This leave type allows maximum {{max}} days. You selected {{requested}} days.

errors.load_leave_types: Failed to load leave types. Please refresh the page.
errors.load_required_data: Failed to load required data. Please refresh the page or contact support.
errors.fix_validation: Please fix the validation errors below before submitting.
errors.auth_failed: User authentication failed. Please log in again.
errors.submit_failed: Failed to submit leave application. Please try again.
errors.balance_missing: Your leave balance record is missing. The system will attempt to create it automatically. Please try again in a moment.
errors.service_unavailable: Leave application service is currently unavailable. Please try again later or contact IT support.
errors.network: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.server: Server error occurred. This might be due to missing leave balances. The system administrator has been notified.
errors.solution_wait: Wait a moment and try again
errors.solution_contact_hr: Contact HR to verify your leave balances
errors.solution_select_other: Try selecting a different leave type
errors.solution_check_dates: Ensure your dates are valid and within allowed limits

success.next_steps: Your manager will review it shortly. You'll receive notifications at each step.
success.step1_desc: Your leave request has been received
success.step2_desc: Your manager will review the request
success.step3_desc: HR department will give final approval

validation.max_consecutive: Maximum consecutive leaves must be at least 1 day

fields.carry_over_enabled: Allow Leave Carry Over to Next Year

help.advance_notice: Minimum notice period before leave starts
help.max_per_year: Total leave days allowed per calendar year
help.min_duration: Minimum allowed leave duration (0.5 = half day)
help.carry_over_enabled: Enable unused leave days to be carried over
help.carry_over_limit: Maximum days that can be carried over to next year
help.auto_approve: Automatically approve leaves shorter than specified duration
help.approval_reminder: Send reminder after this many hours if not approved
help.system_alerts: Receive system health alerts and weekly reports
help.fiscal_start: Start date for the fiscal year (affects leave balances)
help.working_days: Select which days are considered working days
help.holiday_calendar: Holiday calendar for automatic leave calculations
help.timezone: Time zone for all date and time displays
